sn46.8:1.1: Ekam samayam ayasma ca upavano ayasma ca sariputto kosambiyam viharanti ghositarame.
sn46.8:1.2: Atha kho ayasma sariputto sayanhasamayam patisallana vutthito yenayasma upavano tenupasankami; upasankamitva ayasmata upavanena saddhim sammodi.
sn46.8:1.3: Sammodaniyam katham saraniyam vitisaretva ekamantam nisidi. Ekamantam nisinno kho ayasma sariputto ayasmantam upavanam etadavoca:
sn46.8:2.1: “Janeyya nu kho, avuso upavana, bhikkhu ‘paccattam yonisomanasikara evam susamaraddha me satta bojjhanga phasuviharaya samvattanti’”ti?
sn46.8:2.2: “Janeyya kho, avuso sariputta, bhikkhu ‘paccattam yonisomanasikara evam susamaraddha me satta bojjhanga phasuviharaya samvattanti’”ti.
sn46.8:3.1: “Satisambojjhangam kho, avuso, bhikkhu arabbhamano pajanati ‘cittanca me suvimuttam, thinamiddhanca me susamuhatam, uddhaccakukkuccanca me suppativinitam, araddhanca me viriyam, atthim katva manasi karomi, no ca linan’ti …pe…
sn46.8:3.2: upekkhasambojjhangam avuso, bhikkhu arabbhamano pajanati ‘cittanca me suvimuttam, thinamiddhanca me susamuhatam, uddhaccakukkuccanca me suppativinitam, araddhanca me viriyam, atthim katva manasi karomi, no ca linan’”ti.
sn46.8:3.3: “Evam kho, avuso sariputta, bhikkhu janeyya ‘paccattam yonisomanasikara evam susamaraddha me satta bojjhanga phasuviharaya samvattanti’”ti.
